    • Uses of TweetRetrievalEvent in org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter

      Methods in org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter with parameters of type TweetRetrievalEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void TweetFilter.filterTweets(TweetRetrievalEvent event)
      Use the data in the TweetRetrievalEvent event parameter to filter out the tweets from Twitter that we have already seen.
      protected void TwitterHandler.loadTweetsFromLastRun(TweetRetrievalEvent event)
      Get the tweets Tweial found during its last run and load them into the TweetRetrievalEvent parameter

      Get the status from your twitter home timeline.
      protected void TwitterPage.printTweets(TweetRetrievalEvent event)
      Print the tweets
      protected void TwitterHandler.removeTweetsThatAreTooOld(TweetRetrievalEvent event)
      Remove from Tweial's tweet store the tweets which are more than 7 days old.
      protected void TwitterHandler.saveNewTweetsFromThisRun(TweetRetrievalEvent event)
      From the TweetRetrievalEvent parameter, get the list of new tweets Tweial found during this run and store those tweets so that the next time Tweial runs it knows to filter them out.
